bio:
He is shackled to the stone wall within the torture chamber in the Dawnstar Sanctuary of the Dark Brotherhood. He is a Nord man with long dark hair. He has been stripped down to only his underwear. An old woman, a younger woman, and another man are also bound to the wall within this torture chamber. These four victims have been kidnapped by the Dark Brotherhood. These four victims have been kidnapped by the Dark Brotherhood, and have been subject to brutal torture.
Quotes:
"Please..."
"What is it you want?"
"Just... just stop. And I'll tell you where I've hidden my treasure."
If sufficiently tortured: "It's... in a hollowed-out rock. In the tundra. A bit west of Whiterun. Now please... please stop."
"Oh gods, you've taken everything I have. Just kill me and be done with it..."
name: Torture Victim
